name: "That's Our Miracle" Honoka Kosaka
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "Forever and Ever" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +7000 power and your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)

name: "Sun Shower" Eli
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters on the center stage, and return it to your opponent's hand.
flavorText:
In Russia, the fox doesn't have a very good image……
But it's different in Japan.

name: "The Sheep's Feelings" Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I'm a sheep! It's so much fun being so fluffy.

name: "Whimsical Girl" Rin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power and +1 soul until end of turn. X is equal to 1500 multiplied by that character's level.
flavorText:
Meow! Meow meow……
Do you have any idea what I'm saying?

name: "No Brand Girls" Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to six cards from the top of your deck, choose three cards from among them, and put them into your waiting room. Put the rest of the cards on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, all of your other characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Let's work together to make everyone happy!

name: "Strange Sympathy" Hanayo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] Until end of turn, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【Reverse】, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards."
flavorText: This costume…… I'm not sure why, but I feel very calm.

name: "Towards a Dream" μ's
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 【STAND】 《Music》 characters, and 【REST】 it. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【Reverse】, if a card named "That's Our Miracle" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.

flavorText: Oh, isn't this outfit a little…… flashy? It feels out of place.

text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Nico(にこ)" in its card name get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with "Nico(にこ)" in its card name, and until end of turn, that characters gets +2000 power and the following ability. text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Leave the support to me.

name: Designer, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your attack phase, if a card named "Door to Our Dreams" is in your climax area and this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a level 0 or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, put it on any position of your stage, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: After taking a break, I got all kinds of ideas.

name: Honoka in Training Wear
flavorText: All right, let's sing together!

name: Attacking the Peak, Umi
text: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Door to Our Dreams" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to one level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, put it on any position of your stage, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We'll attack the peak!

name: Umi in Training Wear
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavorText: We can keep working hard, right?

name: Wonderful Rush
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: "Let's Go Out Together♪" Maki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of characters you have with "Assist". 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] When you use "Change", if this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: If we don't hurry, we'll have to leave it.

name: "Let's Go Out Together♪" Hanayo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Pl-Please wait! Don't leave me behind-!

name: Rin in Regular Clothes
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When you use "Change", choose up to two of your other characters, and those characters get +1 level until end of turn.
flavorText: I want to play outside more than anything-

name: Spotting an Idol! Hanayo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: That was her!

name: Hanayo in Pajamas
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Change [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""No Brand Girls" Hanayo" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I-I'm embarrassed, so please don't stare at me like that…

name: "Let's Go Out Together♪" Rin
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to another open position of your center stage.
flavorText: Huh? Do I have something on my face?

name: Alpaca
text: 【CONT】 If you would pay the "Change" cost for one of your characters, you may put this card into your waiting room instead of one or two cards from your stock.

name: Rin in Pajamas
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Whimsical Girl" Rin" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ta-daa, these are my cat pajamas-!

name: Maki in Training Wear
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When a card named "Tight Hug, and Closing In on "love"!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 2 or lower 《Music》 character, put it on any position of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: Yeah, I don't have time for breaks.

name: Composing, Maki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Door to Our Dreams" is in your climax area and the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is two or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, search you deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Maki in Regular Clothes
flavorText: What's up? All right, let's go.

name: Maki in Pajamas
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(3) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""You're My Next Catch" Maki" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Hey! Hey! Go over there.

name: Hanayo in Regular Clothes
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: This outfit… Isn't it a little weird?

name: Rin in Training Wear
flavorText: I'm thirsty from all that practice-

name: Wailing Rin
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【Reverse】. you may draw a card. If you do, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: I thought we came to write lyrics-!!

name: Hanayo in Training Wear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm going to try as hard as I possibly can!

name: Tight Hug, and Closing In on "love"!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: "School idol festival" Eli
flavorText: Leave the support to me.

name: "School idol festival" Rin
flavorText: I'll support you-

name: "School idol festival" Maki
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)
flavorText: Oh, alright. I'll help you.

name: "School idol festival" Nozomi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I could tell you your fortune while you're helping me out?

name: "School idol festival" Hanayo
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)
flavorText: I-I'll help with all my strength…

name: "School idol festival" Nico
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavorText: I'll help you♪

name: Love Live! School idol festival
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Both in Swimsuits, Honoka & Umi
text: 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Honoka: "It's……the ocean!"
